item.description: Neural networks learn to denoise images. Before building a full diffusion model, understand the building blocks: conv layers, activations, residual connections.

item.description: Convolution followed by ReLU. This pattern repeats hundreds of times in modern image networks.

item.title: From Numbers to Probabilities: The Softmax Function
item.description: Neural network outputs raw numbers called “logits.” These could be anything: -500, 2.

item.description: ReLU is great but has a problem. Neurons can die. Leaky ReLU fixes this with one small change.

item.title: ReLU: The Simple Function That Powers Deep Learning
item.description: Sigmoid was the standard. Then ReLU came along and made deep learning actually work.
